ethereumDeck.title: Casa Frutero
ethereumDeck.subtitle: The First Permanent Ethereum Community Hub in Mexico

opportunity.title: The Opportunity
opportunity.description: Mexico City is Latin America's largest metro (21M+ people) and a growing tech hub — but no permanent physical anchor for Ethereum exists. Developers work in isolation. Enterprise teams lack local Ethereum expertise. Founders have no systematic pathway to the global ecosystem.
opportunity.casaFrutero: Casa Frutero is a new initiative by Frutero to establish Mexico's first Ethereum Permanent Community Hub — a dedicated space where developers, founders, and enterprises connect with Ethereum.
opportunity.invitation: We're inviting the Ethereum Foundation to be the founding partner — the first to shape this space with Ethereum's vision and values.

alignment.title: Alignment with EF Ecodev Priorities
alignment.description: Casa Frutero directly supports the Ethereum Foundation's ecosystem development goals.

acceleration.title: Ecosystem Acceleration
acceleration.devAccDesc: Weekly coworking creates physical anchor for developer growth. Consistent touchpoints accelerate skill development and ecosystem contribution.
acceleration.appRelationsDesc: Demo days and project showcases surface LATAM applications to the global ecosystem. Hub becomes the venue for app visibility in Mexico.
acceleration.founderSuccessDesc: Systematic pipeline: hackathon prep → mentorship → incubation pathway. Our programs have produced 6 ETHDenver 2025 winners.
acceleration.enterpriseDesc: Location in professional district (Insurgentes Sur) attracts corporate teams. Training programs onboard enterprises to Ethereum.

amplification.title: Ecosystem Amplification (Ethereum Everywhere)
amplification.physicalPresenceDesc: First permanent Ethereum space in Mexico and Central America
amplification.localAnchorDesc: Weekly programming creates consistent community touchpoint
amplification.globalBridgeDesc: Connect LATAM builders with global Ethereum ecosystem
amplification.educationDesc: University outreach, beginner workshops, developer pathways

additional.title: Additional Alignment
additional.privacyDesc: ZK and privacy tech workshops; hub available for PSE programming
additional.publicGoodsDesc: Open access model; community-first programming; no paywalls
additional.researchDesc: Bridge between EF research and practical builder implementation

whoIsFrutero.title: Who is Frutero?
whoIsFrutero.description: Frutero is a LATAM-based organization focused on developing the region's technology ecosystem by connecting local talent with global opportunities. Since 2022, we've built systematic programs, mentorship infrastructure, and community operations that turn curious learners into active contributors.
whoIsFrutero.qualifiedTitle: What makes us qualified to run an Ethereum Hub:
whoIsFrutero.operators: Operators, not organizers — Continuous programming, not one-off events
whoIsFrutero.outcomes: Outcome-focused — Success measured by what builders ship
whoIsFrutero.sustainable: Financially sustainable — Frutero generates revenue through services
whoIsFrutero.regional: Regional expertise — Deep LATAM market knowledge
whoIsFrutero.values: Ethereum-aligned values — Permissionless, public goods, decentralization
whoIsFrutero.closing: Frutero has the resources and network to launch Casa Frutero. We're seeking a founding partner to shape it as an Ethereum-first space.

hub.title: The Hub
hub.address: Insurgentes Sur 1877, Guadalupe Inn, Mexico City
hub.professional: Professional district with corporate offices nearby (Enterprise Acceleration)
hub.metro: 5 min from Metro Barranca del Muerto (accessibility)
hub.universities: Near universities: UNAM, ITESM campus (talent pipeline)

programming.title: Hub Programming (Ecodev Alignment)
programming.allOpen: All programming is open access. No membership fees. Permissionless.

partnerOpportunity.title: The Founding Partner Opportunity
partnerOpportunity.description: We're offering the Ethereum Foundation the privilege to be Casa Frutero's founding partner — shaping Mexico's first official Ethereum Permanent Hub.
partnerOpportunity.firstMoverDesc: First Ethereum Permanent Hub in Mexico/Central America
partnerOpportunity.ecodevOutcomesDesc: Direct support for dev/acc, App Relations, Founder Success
partnerOpportunity.enterpriseAccessDesc: Corporate training venue in key LATAM market
partnerOpportunity.impactReportingDesc: Regular metrics aligned with EF goals
partnerOpportunity.operationsDesc: Full team for daily hub management

partnershipRequest.title: Partnership Request
partnershipRequest.recognition: Official recognition as Mexico's first Ethereum Permanent Hub
partnershipRequest.efResources: EF educational resources for local delivery
partnershipRequest.bestPractices: Best practices from SF, Berlin, London hubs

whyFrutero.title: Why Frutero is the Right Operator
whyFrutero.clearMission: Clear mission aligned with Ethereum values

team.title: Team
team.plusMembers: + 6 team members across community, DevRel, content, technical

nextStep.title: Next Step
nextStep.description: We invite the Ethereum Foundation to be the founding partner of Mexico's first Ethereum Permanent Community Hub.
nextStep.cta: Let's discuss how Casa Frutero supports Ecodev goals.
nextStep.quote: The infrastructure wasn't here. We built the organization. Now we're building the home — with Ethereum at the center.
nextStep.tagline: Casa Frutero — Mexico's First Ethereum Permanent Hub
nextStep.builtBy: Built by Frutero. Shaped by Ethereum.
